review: While in search for something I could use while I have an extended stay at a hotel to watch my Netflix, I came upon this life saver! I have a Roku and absolutely love it. I was very excited to get my Roku plugged into my hotel TV room so I could continue watching my TV show and then I realized it wasn't connecting to Netflix. I didn't understand why and started googling (since I had already started paying $5 a day for video capable streaming Wi-Fi..) I realized I couldn't bypass the hotel screen where I have to enter my hotel room and name on the Roku. I then found the Amazon Fire TV Stick and how the new updated version WAS able to get to the screen for you to type what you need to! IT WORKED! I absolutely love it. Has almost all and maybe even more features than the Roku and I have no connection problems at all. It's a great little device and for $39.95 at Best Buy, you can't beat the price.
